title: The Magic Negro gets the message
author: VD
content_html:
And the self-sabotage begins:

Sen. Barack Obama, D-Ill., told Planned Parenthood Tuesday that sex education for kindergarteners, as long as it is “age-appropriate,” is “the right thing to do.”

It sounds like someone from Team Clinton gave Obama a call and reminded him that he’s supposed to make it look like a race, not actually try and win the nomination. It must have been the Oprah money that inspired this little reminder.

If Obama starts passing Hillary in the polls, we’ll see him start denying global warming, then the Holocaust, and if he gets really desperate, promising to select Ron Mexico as his running mate.
